mapper.insert: insert into quiz_report ( quiz_report_id, quiz_report_member_id, quiz_report_quiz_id, quiz_report_type, quiz_report_content ) values ( quiz_report_seq.nextval, #{quizReportMemberId}, #{quizReportQuizId}, #{quizReportType}, #{quizReportContent} )
mapper.select: select * from quiz_report order by quiz_report_date desc
select quiz_report_type, count(*) as count from quiz_report where quiz_report_quiz_id = #{quizReportQuizId} group by quiz_report_type

select * from view_quiz_report_stats
and quiz_status in ('ACTIVE', 'BLIND')
and quiz_status = 'DELETED'
order by last_reported_at desc

select m.member_nickname AS memberNickname, qr.quiz_report_content AS quizReportContent, qr.quiz_report_date AS quizReportDate from quiz_report qr left join member m ON qr.quiz_report_member_id = m.member_id where qr.quiz_report_quiz_id = #{quizId} AND qr.quiz_report_type = 'ETC' order by qr.quiz_report_date DESC
